data.overwrite_coordinator_ieee: Permanently replace the radio IEEE address

maybe_confirm_ezsp_restore.description:
Your backup has a different IEEE address than your radio.  For your network to function properly, the IEEE address of your radio should also be changed.

This is a permanent operation.
maybe_confirm_ezsp_restore.title: Overwrite Radio IEEE Address

pick_radio.description: Pick a type of your Zigbee radio
pick_radio.title: Radio Type

upload_manual_backup.description: Restore your network settings from an uploaded backup JSON file. You can download one from a different ZHA installation from **Network Settings**, or use a Zigbee2MQTT `coordinator_backup.json` file.
upload_manual_backup.title: Upload a Manual Backup

user.description: Select serial port for Zigbee radio
user.title: ZHA

zha_alarm_options.alarm_failed_tries: The number of consecutive failed code entries to trigger an alarm

zha_alarm_options.title: Alarm Control Panel Options

zha_options.consider_unavailable_battery: Consider battery powered devices unavailable after (seconds)
zha_options.consider_unavailable_mains: Consider mains powered devices unavailable after (seconds)
zha_options.enable_identify_on_join: Enable identify effect when devices join the network
zha_options.enhanced_light_transition: Enable enhanced light color/temperature transition from an off-state
zha_options.light_transitioning_flag: Enable enhanced brightness slider during light transition
zha_options.title: Global Options
